price: 158. Kasi Allah amatisaki ye (Issa) epai naye, mpe Allah atonda bokasi mpe bwanya.
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
